sentences.sContent: I was afraid the sickness had sapped my strength.
sentences.sCn: 恐怕这场病已经消耗了我的力气。

synos.tran: [植]树液；精力，元气；活力；[军]坑道
使衰竭，使伤元气；挖掘以破坏基础

words.tran: 精力充沛的；树液多的；愚笨的
枯萎的；无生气的；无价值的

trans.tranOther: If something saps your strength or confidence, it gradually weakens or destroys it

trans.tranCn: 液， 汁； 精力； 笨蛋
trans.tranOther: the watery substance that carries food through a plant
